# CLI - XinFin Commands

<img align="right" height="65" src="https://github.com/meherett/swap/blob/master/docs/static/svg/xinfin.svg">

  - [HTLC Command](#htlc-command)
  - [Fund Command](#fund-command)
  - [Withdraw Command](#withdraw-command)
  - [Refund Command](#refund-command)
  - [Decode Command](#decode-command)
  - [Sign Command](#sign-command)
  - [Submit Command](#submit-command)

> $ swap `xinfin` command

```shell script
swap xinfin --help
```

<details>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script
Usage: swap xinfin [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...

Options:
  -h, --help  Show this message and exit.

Commands:
  decode    Select XinFin Transaction raw decoder.
  fund      Select XinFin Fund transaction builder.
  htlc      Select XinFin Hash Time Lock Contract (HTLC) builder.
  refund    Select XinFin Refund transaction builder.
  sign      Select XinFin Transaction raw signer.
  submit    Select XinFin Transaction raw submitter.
  withdraw  Select XinFin Withdraw transaction builder.
```
</details>

## HTLC Command

> $ swap xinfin `htlc` command

```shell script
swap xinfin htlc --help
```

<details>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script
Usage: swap xinfin htlc [OPTIONS]

Options:
  -ca, --contract-address TEXT  Set XinFin HTLC contact address.  [default:
                                None]

  -n, --network TEXT            Set XinFin network.  [default: mainnet]
  -x20, --xrc20 TEXT            Set Enable XinFin XRC20 token contract.
                                [default: False]

  -i, --indent INTEGER          Set json indent.  [default: 4]
  -h, --help                    Show this message and exit.
```
</details>

> **Example** -> swap xinfin `htlc` command

**Contract Address** _(str)_ -> xdc1C2F24F4E2427aD43df9c20521B88C78A32Bafb2 **[required]**<br/>
**Network** _(str)_ -> apothem **[default: `mainnet`]**<br/>

> **Returns** _(dict)_ -> XinFin Hash Time Lock Contract (HTLC) bytecode and contract address.

```shell script
swap xinfin htlc --contract-address xdc1C2F24F4E2427aD43df9c20521B88C78A32Bafb2 --network apothem
```

<details open>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```json5
{
  "abi": [{"anonymous": false, "inputs": [{"indexed": true, "internalType": "bytes32", "name": "locked_contract_id", "type": "bytes32"}, {"indexed": false, "internalType": "bytes32", "name": "secret_hash", "type": "bytes32"}, {"indexed": true, "internalType": "address", "name": "recipient", "type": "address"}, {"indexed": true, "internalType": "address", "name": "sender", "type": "address"}, {"indexed": false, "internalType": "uint256", "name": "endtime", "type": "uint256"}, {"indexed": false, "internalType": "uint256", "name": "amount", "type": "uint256"}], "name": "log_fund", "type": "event"}, {"anonymous": false, "inputs": [{"indexed": true, "internalType": "bytes32", "name": "locked_contract_id", "type": "bytes32"}], "name": "log_refund", "type": "event"}, {"anonymous": false, "inputs": [{"indexed": true, "internalType": "bytes32", "name": "locked_contract_id", "type": "bytes32"}], "name": "log_withdraw", "type": "event"}, {"inputs": [{"internalType": "bytes32", "name": "secret_hash", "type": "bytes32"}, {"internalType": "address payable", "name": "recipient", "type": "address"}, {"internalType": "address payable", "name": "sender", "type": "address"}, {"internalType": "uint256", "name": "endtime", "type": "uint256"}], "name": "fund", "outputs": [{"internalType": "bytes32", "name": "locked_contract_id", "type": "bytes32"}], "stateMutability": "payable", "type": "function"}, {"inputs": [{"internalType": "bytes32", "name": "locked_contract_id", "type": "bytes32"}], "name": "get_locked_contract", "outputs": [{"internalType": "bytes32", "name": "id", "type": "bytes32"}, {"internalType": "bytes32", "name": "secret_hash", "type": "bytes32"}, {"internalType": "address", "name": "recipient", "type": "address"}, {"internalType": "address", "name": "sender", "type": "address"}, {"internalType": "uint256", "name": "endtime", "type": "uint256"}, {"internalType": "uint256", "name": "amount", "type": "bool", "name": "", "type": "bool"}], "stateMutability": "nonpayable", "type": "function"}, {"inputs": [{"internalType": "bytes32", "name": "locked_contract_id", "type": "bytes32"}, {"internalType": "string", "name": "preimage", "type": "string"}], "name": "withdraw", "outputs": [{"internalType": "bool", "name": "", "type": "bool"}], "stateMutability": "nonpayable", "type": "function"}], 
  "bytecode": "",
  "bytecode_runtime": "",
  "contract_address": "xdc959c04329fa6B45d0250A2315673e4F952218BdE"
}

```
</details>

## Fund Command

> $ swap xinfin `fund` command

```shell script
swap xinfin fund --help
```

<details>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script
Usage: swap xinfin fund [OPTIONS]

Options:
  -sh, --secret-hash TEXT        Set secret 256 hash.  [required]
  -ra, --recipient-address TEXT  Set XinFin recipient address.  [required]
  -sa, --sender-address TEXT     Set XinFin sender address.  [required]
  -e, --endtime INTEGER          Set Expiration block timestamp.  [required]
  -am, --amount FLOAT            Set XinFin fund amount.  [required]
  -u, --unit TEXT                Set XinFin fund amount unit.  [default: Wei]
  -ca, --contract-address TEXT   Set XinFin HTLC contact address.  [default:
                                 None]

  -ta, --token-address TEXT      Set XinFin XRC20 token address.  [default:
                                 None]

  -n, --network TEXT             Set XinFin network.  [default: mainnet]
  -x20, --xrc20 TEXT             Set Enable XinFin XRC20 token contract.
                                 [default: False]

  -h, --help                     Show this message and exit.
```
</details>

> **Example** -> swap xinfin `fund` command

**Secret Hash** _(str)_ -> 3a26da82ead15a80533a02696656b14b5dbfd84eb14790f2e1be5e9e45820eeb **[required]**<br/>
**Recipient Address** _(str)_ -> xdcf8D43806260CFc6cC79fB408BA1897054667F81C **[required]**<br/>
**Sender Address** _(str)_ -> xdc2224caA2235DF8Da3D2016d2AB1137D2d548A232 **[required]**<br/>
**Endtime** _(int)_ -> 1625296657 **[required]**<br/>
**Amount** _(int, float)_ -> 1 **[required]**<br/>
**Unit** _(str)_ -> XDC **[default: `Wei`]**<br/>
**Contract Address** _(str)_ -> xdc1C2F24F4E2427aD43df9c20521B88C78A32Bafb2 **[required]**<br/>
**Network** _(str)_ -> apothem **[default: `mainnet`]**<br/>

> **Returns** _(str)_ -> XinFin unsigned fund transaction raw.

```shell script
swap xinfin fund --secret-hash 3a26da82ead15a80533a02696656b14b5dbfd84eb14790f2e1be5e9e45820eeb --recipient-address xdcf8D43806260CFc6cC79fB408BA1897054667F81C --sender-address xdc2224caA2235DF8Da3D2016d2AB1137D2d548A232 --endtime 1625296657 --amount 1 --unit XDC --contract-address xdc1C2F24F4E2427aD43df9c20521B88C78A32Bafb2 --network apothem
```

<details open>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script

```
</details>

## Withdraw Command

> $ swap xinfin `withdraw` command

```shell script
swap xinfin withdraw --help
```

<details>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script
Usage: swap xinfin withdraw [OPTIONS]

Options:
  -th, --transaction-hash TEXT  Set XinFin funded transaction hash/id.
                                [required]

  -a, --address TEXT            Set XinFin recipient address.  [required]
  -sk, --secret-key TEXT        Set secret password/passphrase.  [required]
  -ca, --contract-address TEXT  Set XinFin HTLC contact address.  [default:
                                None]

  -n, --network TEXT            Set XinFin network.  [default: mainnet]
  -x20, --xrc20 TEXT            Set Enable XinFin XRC20 token contract.
                                [default: False]

  -h, --help                    Show this message and exit.
```
</details>

> **Example** -> swap xinfin `withdraw` command

**Transaction Hash** _(str)_ -> 0x0d4c93546aa3e5e476455931a63f1a97a2624e3b516e3fd8e3a582cb20aaeef9 **[required]**<br/>
**Recipient Address** _(str)_ -> xdcf8D43806260CFc6cC79fB408BA1897054667F81C **[required]**<br/>
**Secret Key** _(str)_ -> Hello Meheret! **[required]**<br/>
**Contract Address** _(str)_ -> xdc1C2F24F4E2427aD43df9c20521B88C78A32Bafb2 **[required]**<br/>
**Network** _(str)_ -> apothem **[default: `mainnet`]**<br/>

> **Returns** _(str)_ -> XinFin unsigned withdraw transaction raw.

```shell script
swap xinfin withdraw --transaction-hash 0x0d4c93546aa3e5e476455931a63f1a97a2624e3b516e3fd8e3a582cb20aaeef9 --address xdcf8D43806260CFc6cC79fB408BA1897054667F81C --secret-key "Hello Meheret!" --contract-address xdc1C2F24F4E2427aD43df9c20521B88C78A32Bafb2 --network apothem
```

<details open>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script

```
</details>

## Refund Command

> $ swap xinfin `refund` command

```shell script
swap xinfin refund --help
```

<details>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script
Usage: swap xinfin refund [OPTIONS]

Options:
  -th, --transaction-hash TEXT  Set XinFin funded transaction hash/id.
                                [required]

  -a, --address TEXT            Set XinFin sender address.  [required]
  -ca, --contract-address TEXT  Set XinFin HTLC contact address.  [default:
                                None]

  -n, --network TEXT            Set XinFin network.  [default: mainnet]
  -x20, --xrc20 TEXT            Set Enable XinFin XRC20 token contract.
                                [default: False]

  -h, --help                    Show this message and exit.
```
</details>

> **Example** -> swap xinfin `refund` command

**Transaction Hash** _(str)_ -> 0x0d4c93546aa3e5e476455931a63f1a97a2624e3b516e3fd8e3a582cb20aaeef9 **[required]**<br/>
**Sender Address** _(str)_ -> xdc2224caA2235DF8Da3D2016d2AB1137D2d548A232 **[required]**<br/>
**Contract Address** _(str)_ -> xdc1C2F24F4E2427aD43df9c20521B88C78A32Bafb2 **[required]**<br/>
**Network** _(str)_ -> apothem **[default: `mainnet`]**<br/>

> **Returns** _(str)_ -> XinFin unsigned refund transaction raw.

```shell script
swap xinfin refund --transaction-hash 0x0d4c93546aa3e5e476455931a63f1a97a2624e3b516e3fd8e3a582cb20aaeef9 --address xdc2224caA2235DF8Da3D2016d2AB1137D2d548A232 --contract-address xdc1C2F24F4E2427aD43df9c20521B88C78A32Bafb2 --network apothem
```

<details open>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script

```
</details>

## Decode Command

> $ swap xinfin `decode` command

```shell script
swap xinfin decode --help
```

<details>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script
Usage: swap xinfin decode [OPTIONS]

Options:
  -tr, --transaction-raw TEXT  Set XinFin transaction raw.  [required]
  -i, --indent INTEGER         Set json indent.  [default: 4]
  -h, --help                   Show this message and exit.
```
</details>

> **Example** -> swap xinfin `decode` command

**Transaction Raw** _(str)_ -> eyJmZWUiOiAxMzg0NDgsICJ0eXBlIjogInhpbmZpbl9mdW5kX3NpZ25lZCIs... **[required]**<br/>

> **Returns** _(str)_ -> XinFin transaction json.

```shell script
swap xinfin decode --transaction-raw 
```

<details open>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```json5
{
    "fee": 138448,
    "transaction": {
        "chainId": 1337,
        "from": "0x2224caA2235DF8Da3D2016d2AB1137D2d548A232",
        "value": 1000000000000000000,
        "nonce": 2,
        "gas": 138448,
        "gasPrice": 20000000000,
        "to": "0xdE06b10c67765c8C0b9F64E0eF423b45Eb86b8e7",
        "data": "0xf4fd30623a26da82ead15a80533a02696656b14b5dbfd84eb14790f2e1be5e9e45820eeb000000000000000000000000f8d43806260cfc6cc79fb408ba1897054667f81c0000000000000000000000002224caa2235df8da3d2016d2ab1137d2d548a2320000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000060e00f11"
    },
    "signatures": {
        "hash": "0x84e48ebae18668b38de2c19d133264adb27d95f6980484dba8a1144506c85418",
        "rawTransaction": "",
        "r": 38365063563831866296402173483048263508654605355040703592765563745771068546493,
        "s": 22112967923060559574350002979663667581956923731042877309885602008095923538234,
        "v": 2710
    },
    "network": "apothem",
    "type": "xinfin_fund_signed"
}
```
</details>

## Sign Command

> $ swap xinfin `sign` command

```shell script
swap xinfin sign --help
```

<details>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script
Usage: swap xinfin sign [OPTIONS]

Options:
  -xpk, --xprivate-key TEXT    Set XinFin root xprivate key.  [required]
  -tr, --transaction-raw TEXT  Set XinFin unsigned transaction raw.
                               [required]

  -ac, --account INTEGER       Set XinFin derivation from account.  [default:
                               0]

  -ch, --change BOOLEAN        Set XinFin derivation from change.  [default:
                               False]

  -ad, --address INTEGER       Set XinFin derivation from address.  [default:
                               0]

  -p, --path TEXT              Set XinFin derivation from path.  [default:
                               None]

  -h, --help                   Show this message and exit.
```
</details>

> **Example** -> swap xinfin `sign` command

**Root XPrivate Key** _(str)_ -> xprv9s21ZrQH143K3Y3pdbkbjreZQ9RVmqTLhRgf86uZyCJk2ou36YdUJt5frjwihGWmV1fQEDioiGZXWXUbHLy3kQf5xmhvhp8dZ2tfn6tgGUj **[required]**<br/>
**Unsigned Transaction Raw** _(str)_ -> eyJmZWUiOiAxMzg0NDgsICJ0eXBlIjogInhpbmZpbl9mdW5kX3Vuc2lnbmV... **[required]**<br/>
**Path** _(str)_ -> m/44'/550'/0'/0/0 **[default: `m/44'/550'/0'/0/0`]**<br/>

> **Returns** _(str)_ -> XinFin signed transaction raw.

```shell script
swap xinfin sign --xprivate-key xprv9s21ZrQH143K3Y3pdbkbjreZQ9RVmqTLhRgf86uZyCJk2ou36YdUJt5frjwihGWmV1fQEDioiGZXWXUbHLy3kQf5xmhvhp8dZ2tfn6tgGUj --path "m/44'/550'/0'/0/0" --transaction-raw 
```

<details open>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script

```
</details>

## Submit Command

> $ swap xinfin `submit` command

```shell script
swap xinfin submit --help
```

<details>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script
Usage: swap xinfin submit [OPTIONS]

Options:
Options:
  -tr, --transaction-raw TEXT  Set signed XinFin transaction raw.  [required]
  -h, --help                   Show this message and exit.
```
</details>

> **Example** -> swap xinfin `submit` command

**Signed Transaction Raw** _(str)_ -> eyJmZWUiOiAxMzg0NDgsICJ0eXBlIjogInhpbmZpbl9mdW5kX3NpZ25lZCI... **[required]**<br/>

> **Returns** _(str)_ -> XinFin blockchain transaction id.

```shell script
swap xinfin submit --transaction-raw 
```

<details open>
  <summary>Output</summary><br/>

```shell script
0x84e48ebae18668b38de2c19d133264adb27d95f6980484dba8a1144506c85418
```
</details>
